attributes.action: request that Nestle reintroduce their old style foil and paper wrappers for two and four finger Kit Kat's.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new style "foil fresh" packaging is difficult to open and the consumer of the product invariably damages the confectionery within whilst attempting to open said item. We would also suggest that the new style packaging is more damaging to the environment. This is NOT progress.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
